show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
On the Project Censored Show, KPFA Pacifica Radio, hosts Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips interview author Dr. Paul Palmer on Zero Waste and offer solutions to the growing problems of waste management and recycling programs.
During the second half of the show they interview  journalist and activist Sunsara Taylor of StopPatriachy.
org who talks about radical feminism, recent censorship on women’s rights issues (especially concerning abortion rights), and  radically transforming a patriarchal world by addressing the overarching problems of capitalism and oppression.
